price: 59.israa-iil xaylok isi nafsi yudlume mari ixxica keenik iyyen maxcok Aka maxco iyyeeniih magaala Saloofah cisik Axcuk culen, tokkel isi nafsi Yallih Amrih cinat yudlume maral digaala Qaraanak oobisne usun Ni-Amri cineeniih Ni-Taaqatak yewqeenih Sugeenimih Sabbatah.
arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ قَوۡلًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fabaddala alladhīna ẓalamū qawlan ghayra alladhī qīla lahum fa-anzalnā ʿalā alladhīna ẓalamū rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
